executive_summary: The Core School maintains a stable sentiment with a strong share of voice in the entertainment education sector. Opportunities exist to expand program offerings and enhance industry collaborations to mitigate competitive risks.
key_findings: The Core School has a stable sentiment trend, indicating consistent brand perception.
The Core School dominates the share of voice in the Curriculum & Programs category, outperforming competitors.
The sentiment spike on September 21 suggests positive reception to specific program offerings or events.

opportunities.opportunity: Expandir la oferta de programas en escritura de guiones y producción audiovisual práctica.
Expandir colaboraciones con empresas del sector audiovisual para mejorar la inserción laboral de los estudiantes.

risks.risk: Alta competencia de otras escuelas especializadas en cine y producción audiovisual en Madrid.
risks.mitigation: Diferenciarse mediante programas únicos y colaboraciones estratégicas.

recommendations: Desarrollar programas online para ampliar el alcance de la audiencia.
Fortalecer las colaboraciones con empresas del sector para mejorar la empleabilidad de los estudiantes.
Promover las fortalezas únicas de The Core School en campañas de marketing para mantener el liderazgo en share of voice.

anomalies.note: Increased sentiment possibly due to positive mentions highlighting The Core School's offerings.

global.sentiment_vs_volume: The sentiment remains stable despite fluctuations in mentions, indicating consistent perception.

by_category.sentiment_vs_volume: Stable sentiment with consistent mention volume suggests steady interest in programs.
